attributes.action: Save central college, Beeston, Nottingham from closure
attributes.background: This college is in a Good  location and has been open for years. Many students would find it difficult to relocate to Nottingham. It is also good for local business,  these have already suffered due to the team being buult

rejection.details: The decision to close Central College, Beeston appears to be one taken by the college authorities, not by the UK Government. You could raise your concerns directly with the senior management of Central College.
